name: The Floor Is Actually Lava (IJplayz)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

DESCRIPTION

You're a kid--you're on a playground and find yourself surrounded by lava. You want to escape, but the lava continues to rise. Luckily, you just ate your green vegetables--you should be able to climb to the top of the playground. Can you survive until your mom gets back?

CONTROLS

LEFT/RIGHT - Movement
SPACE - Jump

CREDITS

Isaac Junus / IJplayz - Lead Artist and Programming
All music from Kevin Macleod
Most of the code is from this tutorial

Inspired by every platformer game ever
